item.title: 1 Error (adding skill menus)
item.dc:creator: @dangerscape dangerscape
item.description:
@dangerscape wrote:

public void parseIncomingPackets(){
int i;
int junk;
int junk2;
int junk3;

	switch(packetType) {
		case 0: break;		// idle packet - keeps on reseting timeOutCounter

		case 202:			// idle logout packet - ignore for now
			break;
		case 210: // loads new area

                            break;
		case 40:
			if (NpcDialogue == 1 || NpcDialogue == 3 || NpcDialogue == 5  || NpcDialogue == 40 || NpcDialogue == 42 || NpcDialogue == 1001 || NpcDialogue == 1002 || NpcDialogue == 2259 || NpcDialogue == 2260 || NpcDialogue == 301 || NpcDialogue == 305 || NpcDialogue == 308 || NpcDialogue == 309 || NpcDialogue == 313 || NpcDialogue == 314 || NpcDialogue == 317 || NpcDialogue == 318 || NpcDialogue == 319 || NpcDialogue == 322 || NpcDialogue == 323 || NpcDialogue == 14600 || NpcDialogue == 14602 || NpcDialogue == 550 || NpcDialogue == 1694 || NpcDialogue == 1339) {
				NpcDialogue += 1;
				NpcDialogueSend = false;
			} else if (NpcDialogue == 6 || NpcDialogue == 7 || NpcDialogue == 300 || NpcDialogue == 303 || NpcDialogue == 304 || NpcDialogue == 307 || NpcDialogue == 310 || NpcDialogue == 311 || NpcDialogue == 312 || NpcDialogue == 315 || NpcDialogue == 316 || NpcDialogue == 320 || NpcDialogue == 321 || NpcDialogue == 324 || NpcDialogue == 325 || NpcDialogue == 326 || NpcDialogue == 14604) {
				NpcDialogue = 0;
				NpcDialogueSend = false;
				RemoveAllWindows();
			}
		 else if (NpcDialogue == 31 || NpcDialogue == 30) // NEW CLUE
			{sendFrame200(4883, 591);
			sendFrame126(GetNpcName(NpcTalkTo), 4884);
			sendFrame126("Heres your next clue, goodluck", 4885);
			sendFrame75(NpcTalkTo, 4883);
			sendFrame164(4882);
			NpcDialogueSend = true;
                            newclue(cluelevel);
                            RemoveAllWindows();
			}
		else if (NpcDialogue == 32) // COMPLETED CLUE
			{sendFrame200(4883, 591);
			sendFrame126(GetNpcName(NpcTalkTo), 4884);
			sendFrame126("Congratulations! Heres your last reward!", 4885);
			sendFrame75(NpcTalkTo, 4883);
			sendFrame164(4882);
			NpcDialogueSend = true;
                            givereward(cluelevel);
                            RemoveAllWindows();
			}
                            /*QUEST INVISIBLE ARMOUR (id 1) npc chat*/

This the code what ive add…

//clicking skill buttons
case 33206: //Attack
server.clickingSkills.AttackMenu(playerId);
break;

				case 33209: //Strength
				server.clickingSkills.StrMenu(playerId);
				break;

				case 33212: //Defence
				server.clickingSkills.DefMenu(playerId);
				break;

				case 33215: //Range
				server.clickingSkills.RangeMenu(playerId);
				break;

				case 33218: //Prayer 
				server.clickingSkills.PrayerMenu(playerId);
				break;

				case 33221: //Magic
				server.clickingSkills.MagicMenu(playerId);
				break;

				case 33224: //Runecrafting
				server.clickingSkills.RCMenu(playerId);
				break;

				case 33207: //Hitpoints
				server.clickingSkills.HPMenu(playerId);
				break;

				case 33210: //Agility
				server.clickingSkills.AgilityMenu(playerId);
				break;

				case 33213: //Herblore
				server.clickingSkills.HerbloreMenu(playerId);
				break;

				case 33216: //Theiving
				server.clickingSkills.TheivingMenu(playerId);
				break;

				case 33219: //Crafting
				server.clickingSkills.CraftingMenu(playerId);
				break;

				case 33222: //Fletching
				server.clickingSkills.FletchingMenu(playerId);
			        break;

				case 47130: //Slayer
				server.clickingSkills.SlayerMenu(playerId);
				break;

				case 33208: //Mining
				server.clickingSkills.MiningMenu(playerId);
				break;

				case 33211: //Smithing
				server.clickingSkills.SmithingMenu(playerId);
				break;

				case 33214: //Fishing
				server.clickingSkills.FishingMenu(playerId);
				break;

				case 33217: //Cooking
				server.clickingSkills.CookingMenu(playerId);
				break;

				case 33220: //Firemaking
				server.clickingSkills.FiremakingMenu(playerId);
				break;

				case 33223: //Woodcutting
				server.clickingSkills.WCMenu(playerId);
				break;

				case 54104: //Farming
				server.clickingSkills.FarmingMenu(playerId);
				break;
